text: Anata gata wa shito no yobikake o, anata gata sogo-kan no yobikake no yo ni shite wa naranai. Arra wa anata gata no naka, hisokani nukedasu mono o shitte ora reru. Sorede, kare (arra) no meirei ni ihan suru mono wa shiren ga kudari, matawa itamashi chobatsu ga kase rarerukara, yojin sa se nasai
